statements: SELECT * FROM media_consumption_patterns WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT media_type, media_title FROM media_consumption_patterns WHERE media_type = 'Movie'
SELECT user_id, consumption_duration FROM media_consumption_patterns WHERE consumption_duration > 60
SELECT media_title FROM media_consumption_patterns WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY consumption_duration DESC
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM media_consumption_patterns
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_patterns ORDER BY user_id DESC, consumption_duration ASC
SELECT media_title, consumption_duration FROM media_consumption_patterns WHERE media_type='TV'
SELECT user_id, media_title FROM media_consumption_patterns WHERE consumption_duration > 60 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT MAX(consumption_duration) AS max_duration, media_type FROM media_consumption_patterns GROUP BY media_type
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM media_consumption_patterns
SELECT * FROM media_consumption;
SELECT user_id, media_type FROM media_consumption ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT decision_id, regulation_type FROM regulatory_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM media_consumption GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) AS average_duration FROM media_consumption;
SELECT user_id, media_type, duration_minutes FROM media_consumption WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT media_type, duration_minutes, user_id FROM media_consumption WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND regulation_type = 'Compliance' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT regulation_type, decision_id FROM regulatory_decisions WHERE decision_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND regulation_type LIKE '%Privacy%' ORDER BY decision_id;
SELECT decision_id, regulation_type FROM regulatory_decisions WHERE regulation_type LIKE '%Data%' ORDER BY decision_date DESC, decision_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT media_type, duration_minutes FROM media_consumption_data WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_data ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description FROM regulatory_decisions WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, media_type, duration_minutes FROM media_consumption_data ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT decision_id, approval_status FROM regulatory_decisions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, media_type, media_title FROM Media_Consumption_Patterns;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM User_Profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date, regulatory_body FROM Regulatory_Decisions WHERE regulatory_body='FCC';
SELECT company_name, industry, country, revenue FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry='Entertainment' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM User_Profiles WHERE location='New York' AND age > 25;
SELECT user_id, media_type, media_title FROM Media_Consumption_Patterns ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM User_Profiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Male';
SELECT media_title, duration_minutes FROM Media_Consumption_Patterns WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM Regulatory_Decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2021-01-01' AND decision_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry='Entertainment' AND revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM media_consumption_data;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_spent_in_minutes FROM media_consumption_data WHERE time_spent_in_minutes > 120;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM media_consumption_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, content_type, num_of_viewers FROM content_providers WHERE num_of_viewers < 1000 ORDER BY num_of_viewers DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_spent_in_minutes, timestamp FROM media_consumption_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT provider_name, num_of_viewers FROM content_providers WHERE content_type = 'Movie' ORDER BY num_of_viewers DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_type FROM regulatory_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Approved'
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_demographics WHERE age < 25);
